requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: Overview of ecology, including ecosystem structure and function, ecosystem dynamics, methods of ecosystem analysis, energy flow, nutrient dynamics, population and community ecology and human dominated ecosystems.
prerequisites: ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections:
Class Nbr: This section is full 2204, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Wegner, Status: Closed
Class Nbr: This section is full 3725, Section #: 2, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: J. Wegner, Status: Closed
